K10D0335_H0339:413b-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0335_H0339:413b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0335_H0339:413b-4: khyod kyis 'khar gsil 'di yongs su bcang bar bya ste /
K10D0335_H0339:413b-6: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang 'khar gsil 'di bsnams so //
K10D0335_H0339:413b-7: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang 'khar gsil 'di bsnams so //
K10D0335_H0339:413b-8: da ltar gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang 'khar gsil 'di bsnams pa yin te /
K10D0335_H0339:413b-9: nga da ltar mngon par sangs rgyas nas 'khar gsil bsnams pa de bzhin du 'das pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:413b-11: da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang nyan
K10D0335_H0339:413b-12: thos rnams la 'khar gsil bcang bar bya'o zhes ston
K10D0335_H0339:414a-0: par mdzad pas / deng nga mngon par rdzogs par sangs @414a *//
K10D0335_H0339:414a-1: rgyas nas kyang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos ji lta ba bzhin du khyed la bstan pa yin gyi /
K10D0335_H0339:414a-2: khyed kyis kyang 'khar gsil bcang bar bya'o //
K10D0335_H0339:414a-4: 'khar gsil zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi 'khar ba zhes kyang bya'o //
K10D0335_H0339:414a-5: yon tan gyi 'khar ba zhes kyang bya ste /
K10D0335_H0339:414a-6: 'phags pa'i ye shes rab tu ston pa'i phyir ye shes kyi 'khar ba zhes bya'o //
K10D0335_H0339:414a-7: yon tan gyi gzhi sgrub pa'i phyir yon tan gyi 'khar ba zhes bya ste /
K10D0335_H0339:414a-8: 'khar gsil 'di ni 'phags pa'i gang zag gi rigs
K10D0335_H0339:414a-9: can skyes bu dam par mtshon pa'i lam gyi chos
K10D0335_H0339:414a-10: la phyogs pa'i rgyal mtshan rjes su dran pa rnam
K10D0335_H0339:414a-11: par bzhag pa'i don gyi spyod pa yin pas de'i
K10D0335_H0339:414a-12: phyir khyod kyis chos bzhin du bcang bar bya'o //
K10D0335_H0339:414a-13: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po stan las langs te /
K10D0335_H0339:414a-14: gos tshags bcos nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
K10D0335_H0339:414a-15: gzar te thal mo sbyar nas pus mo sa la
K10D0335_H0339:414a-16: btsugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
K10D0335_H0339:414a-18: ci'i slad du 'khar gsil zhes bgyi /
K10D0335_H0339:414a-19: ji ltar na bcang bar bgyi /
K10D0335_H0339:414a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol /
K10D0335_H0339:414a-21: bdag cag rnams kyis kyang bka' bzhin du spyod par 'tshal lo zhes gsol ba dang /
K10D0335_H0339:414b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od srung la @414b bka' stsal pa /
K10D0335_H0339:414b-1: legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o //
K10D0335_H0339:414b-2: de la 'khar gsil zhes bya ba ni yang ba yin te /
K10D0335_H0339:414b-3: gang gis 'khar ba 'di la brtan pa 'di dag
K10D0335_H0339:414b-4: nyon mongs pa bsal nas khams gsum las nges par
K10D0335_H0339:414b-6: 'khar gsil zhes bya ba ni snang bar byed pa yin te /
K10D0335_H0339:414b-7: 'khar gsil 'dzin pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de
K10D0335_H0339:414b-8: dag shas rab kyi snang ba thob par 'gyur pa'i
K10D0335_H0339:414b-9: phyir snang bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0335_H0339:414b-10: 'khar gsil zhes bya ba ni phyir mi ldog par byed pa yin te /
K10D0335_H0339:414b-11: 'khar gsil 'dzin pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de
K10D0335_H0339:414b-12: dag srid pa gsum las nges par 'byung zhing yang
K10D0335_H0339:414b-13: mngon par zhen pa nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir
K10D0335_H0339:414b-14: mi ldog par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0335_H0339:414b-15: 'khar gsil zhes bya ba ni khong du chud par byed pa yin te /
K10D0335_H0339:414b-16: gang 'khar gsil 'dzin par byed pa yin zhe na /
K10D0335_H0339:414b-19: khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa'i kun nas dkris par khong du chud pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:414b-21: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bcu gnyis po 'di
K10D0335_H0339:414b-22: dag gsal bar rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir khong du
K10D0335_H0339:414b-23: chud par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0335_H0339:414b-24: 'khar gsil zhes bya ba ni nga rgyal med par byed pa yin te /
K10D0335_H0339:415a-0: gang 'khar gsil 'dzin pa de dag nga rgyal gyi las @415a *//
K10D0335_H0339:415a-1: rab tu spong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir nga rgyal med par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0335_H0339:415a-2: 'khar gsil zhes bya ba ni rgyang bsrings pa yin te /
K10D0335_H0339:415a-3: gang 'khar gsil 'di 'dzin pa'i gang zag gang yin
K10D0335_H0339:415a-4: pa de dag 'dod pa lnga thag ring du byed
K10D0335_H0339:415a-5: pas de dag 'dod pas sred pa'i kun nas dkris
K10D0335_H0339:415a-7: phung po lnga po rnams rnam par 'thor ba dang /
K10D0335_H0339:415a-8: srid pa lnga po dag yongs su spong ba dang /
K10D0335_H0339:415a-9: mya ngan las 'das pa la phyogs shing 'du byed
K10D0335_H0339:415a-10: kyi las kyang thag ring du spong ba'i phyir rgyang
K10D0335_H0339:415a-12: 'khar gsil zhes bya ba ni len par byed pa yin te /
K10D0335_H0339:415a-13: gang 'khar gsil 'dzin par byed pa de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul khrims dang /
K10D0335_H0339:415a-15: shes rab rin po che blangs pas rnam par grol
K10D0335_H0339:415a-16: ba thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir len par byed pa
K10D0335_H0339:415a-17: zhes bya'o // 'khar gsil zhes bya ba ni yongs su grub par 'gyur ba yin te /
K10D0335_H0339:415a-18: gang 'khar gsil 'dzin pa dag sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sde snod mngon par grub pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:415a-19: ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du bsgrubs pas ma nyams
K10D0335_H0339:415a-20: par phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir mngon par
K10D0335_H0339:415a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0335_H0339:415b-0: 'khar gsil zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i @415b don rgya
K10D0335_H0339:415b-1: che zhing mang bas yongs su rdzogs par brjod mi
K10D0335_H0339:415b-2: nus kyang khyed kyis re zhig de bzhin du yongs
K10D0335_H0339:415b-4: bcom ldan 'das la 'od srung gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0335_H0339:415b-6: 'khar gsil zhes bya ba'i don ni de lta bu lags ni /
K10D0335_H0339:415b-7: ci'i slad du ye shes kyi 'khar ba zhes bya
K10D0335_H0339:415b-8: bgyi ba nas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i don
K10D0335_H0339:415b-9: gyi spyod pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyi don gang
K10D0335_H0339:415b-10: lags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bshad du gsol
K10D0335_H0339:415b-11: / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0335_H0339:415b-12: 'khar gsil zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi spyod pa bsgrub pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:415b-13: mang du thos pa rgya cher sgrub pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:415b-15: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab dang /
K10D0335_H0339:415b-20: zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:415b-21: zag pa med pa rnam par thogs pa med par
K10D0335_H0339:415b-22: khong du chud cing shes rab mngon par 'grub par
K10D0335_H0339:415b-23: byed pa'i phyir ye shes kyi 'khar ba zhes kyang
K10D0335_H0339:415b-24: bya'o // tshul khrims dam por srung ba dang /
K10D0335_H0339:415b-26: bsam gtan la sems rtse gcig tu g-yeng ba med par bsgom pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:415b-27: rtag tu bsod nams kyi las bsgrubs pas mgo'am /
K10D0335_H0339:416a-0: thod la me bar ba bzhin du skad cig tsam du'ang mi gtong ba'i phyir @416a *//
K10D0335_H0339:416a-1: yon tan gyi 'khar ba zhes bya'o //
K10D0335_H0339:416a-2: 'khar gsil 'di yongs su 'di 'dzin pa gang yin
K10D0335_H0339:416a-3: pa de dag ni gang gi spyod pa rnam pa
K10D0335_H0339:416a-5: bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang /
K10D0335_H0339:416a-9: tshad med pa bzhi po byams pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:416a-13: bsam gtan bzhi po bsam gtan dang po dang /
K10D0335_H0339:416a-17: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po nam mkha' mtha' byas skye mched dang /
K10D0335_H0339:416a-18: rnam shes mtha' byas skye mched dang /
K10D0335_H0339:416a-19: ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang /
K10D0335_H0339:416a-20: 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:416a-22: spyod pa sum cu rtsa bdun po /
K10D0335_H0339:416a-24: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
K10D0335_H0339:416a-25: phun sum tshogs shing chos de dag gsal bar rnam
K10D0335_H0339:416a-27: bdag nyid kyi lus kyis mngon sum du byas pas sgra'i rjes su mi 'brang ba dang /
K10D0335_H0339:416a-28: chos de dag la bdag nyid rnam par rtsen pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:416b-0: smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgor @416b
K10D0335_H0339:416b-1: 'jug pa la rang dbang du gyur cing dga' ba
K10D0335_H0339:416b-2: med pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa zhes
K10D0335_H0339:416b-3: bya ste / nang yon tan de lta bu dang
K10D0335_H0339:416b-4: ldan pas phyi rol 'khar gsil 'dzin pa yin te;
K10D0335_H0339:416b-5: 'dis ni gang gdon mi za bar 'phags pa'i yon
K10D0335_H0339:416b-11: mngon par shes pa drug dang /
K10D0335_H0339:416b-12: rnam par thar pa brgyad po rnams phun sum tshogs pa yin te /
K10D0335_H0339:416b-13: gang zag de 'phags pa yin par mtshon pa nyid
K10D0335_H0339:416b-14: kyis gus pa skyed par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i
K10D0335_H0339:416b-15: gang zag gi rtags zhes bya'o //
K10D0335_H0339:416b-16: skyes bu dam par mtshon pa zhes bya ba ni
K10D0335_H0339:416b-17: nang na ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid dang ldan
K10D0335_H0339:416b-18: pas dam pa zhes bya ste /
K10D0335_H0339:416b-19: gang zag de 'phags pa yin par mtshon pa nyid
K10D0335_H0339:416b-20: kyis gus pa skyed par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i
K10D0335_H0339:416b-21: nang na ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid dang ldan
K10D0335_H0339:416b-22: pas yon tan gyi gzhi sgrub pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:416b-23: chos gong nas gong du rtsol zhing legs par sgrub
K10D0335_H0339:416b-24: par byed do zhes ston par byed pa'i phyir skyes
K10D0335_H0339:416b-25: bu dam par mtshon pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0335_H0339:416b-26: gang zag gsal ba de ring por mi thogs par
K10D0335_H0339:416b-27: shes rab kyis mngon par grub nas 'dus ma byas
K10D0335_H0339:416b-28: kyi gnas rab tu zhi zhing dben pa mya ngan
K10D0335_H0339:416b-29: las 'das pa'i bde ba don dam pa'i gnas kyi
K10D0335_H0339:417a-0: lam du 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes shes par @417a
K10D0335_H0339:417a-1: *// byed pa'i phyir lam gyi chos la phyogs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o //
K10D0335_H0339:417a-2: rjes su dran pa'i rnam par bzhag pa'i don gyi
K10D0335_H0339:417a-3: spyod pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba 'di rim
K10D0335_H0339:417a-4: pa gsum dang ldan par dum bu gsum gyi rim
K10D0335_H0339:417a-5: pa mthong ba nyid kyis ngan song gsum gyi sdug
K10D0335_H0339:417a-6: bsngal rjes su dran nas tshul khrims dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417a-8: shes rab sgom par byed pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417a-9: gnod pa gsum po rga ba dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417a-11: 'chi ba rjes su dran na dug gsum po 'dod chags dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417a-13: gti mug yongs su sil bar byed pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417a-14: khams gsum po dag mi rtag pa yin pa nyid
K10D0335_H0339:417a-15: du rjes su dran nas dkon mchog gsum la mngon
K10D0335_H0339:417a-16: par yid ches shing gus pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417a-17: srid pa gsum bsal ba dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417a-19: las rnam gsum rnam par spyad pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417a-20: rig pa gsum dang ldan par 'dod pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417a-21: rnam par thar ba gsum la 'jug pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417a-22: rjes su dran pa drug gi gnas gsum thob pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417a-23: ye shes thag ring du byed pa gsum rtogs par
K10D0335_H0339:417a-24: 'gyur ba'i phyir dum bu gsum rim par rnam par
K10D0335_H0339:417a-27: bzhi sgril du byas pa ni skye ba rnam pa bzhi yongs su bcad pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417a-28: bden pa bzhi rjes su dran par bya ba dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417a-29: tshad med pa bzhi sgom pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417b-0: @417b bsam gtan bzhi la 'jug par bya ba dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417b-1: snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su dag par bya ba dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417b-2: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rab tu bstan pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417b-3: yang dag pa spong ba bzhi bstan par bya ba dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417b-4: ting nge 'dzin rkang pa bzhi thob par bya ba'i
K10D0335_H0339:417b-5: phyir bzhi sgril du rnam par bzhag pa yin no
K10D0335_H0339:417b-6: // dbus kyi shing gtogs par rnam par gzhag pa ni lta ba lnga po dag spang ba dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417b-7: 'gro ba lnga po dag gi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi 'khrug pa yongs su spong ba dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417b-8: dbang po lnga sgom pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417b-9: stobs lnga dang ldan par bya ba dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417b-10: sgrib pa lnga po dag bsal ba dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417b-11: phung po lnga po dag rnam par gshig pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417b-12: cha lnga dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sku thob par
K10D0335_H0339:417b-13: bya ba'i phyir rnam pa lngar bzhag pa yin no
K10D0335_H0339:417b-14: // sil sgril bcu gnyis su bstan pa ni rten
K10D0335_H0339:417b-15: cing 'brel bar 'gyur ba yan lag bcu gnyis su
K10D0335_H0339:417b-16: dran par bya zhing thogs pa med par bya ba
K10D0335_H0339:417b-17: // dang / sgo bcu gnyis pa'i bsam gtan bsgom par bya ba dang /
K10D0335_H0339:417b-18: sems la skyon med par rjes su dran par bya'o //
K10D0335_H0339:417b-19: rim pa gsum dang bzhi sgril du bsdus te /
K10D0335_H0339:417b-20: grangs bdun du bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
K10D0335_H0339:417b-21: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi chos rjes su
K10D0335_H0339:417b-23: 'phags pa'i nor bdun mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
K10D0335_H0339:418a-1: rtse gtogs par brgyad du bstan pa ni lam yan
K10D0335_H0339:418a-2: lag brgyad pa rjes su bstan par bya ba dang
K10D0335_H0339:418a-3: / rnam par thar pa brgyad thob par bya ba dang /
K10D0335_H0339:418a-4: mi khom pa brgyad yongs su bsal ba'i phyir rnam pa brgyad bstan pa yin no //
K10D0335_H0339:418a-5: 'khar gsil gyi don mdor bstan pa de lta bu
K10D0335_H0339:418a-6: yin pas khyed kyis legs par yongs su gzung bar
K10D0335_H0339:418a-7: bya'o // bcom ldan 'das la 'od srung gis gsol pa /
K10D0335_H0339:418a-9: 'phags pa'i gsung rab la ji skad bstan pa bzhin
K10D0335_H0339:418a-10: du 'tshal lo zhes gsol to; ;de nas 'od srung
K10D0335_H0339:418a-11: chen pos yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
K10D0335_H0339:418a-13: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kun mtshungs pa zhig lags sam /
K10D0335_H0339:418a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0335_H0339:418a-15: kha cig 'khar ba mtshungs kyang spyod pa mi mtshungs
K10D0335_H0339:418a-16: pas kha cig tshe na ni bzhi sgril du byas
K10D0335_H0339:418a-17: pa'o // kha cig gi tshe na ni nyis sgril du byas pa ste /
K10D0335_H0339:418a-18: sil sgril gyi grangs la ni bye brag tu gyur pa med do //
K10D0335_H0339:418a-19: nga ni deng 'dir bzhi sgril sil sgril bcu gnyis su byas pa'i bstan pa de spyod do //
K10D0335_H0339:418a-20: gnyis sgril du byas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gis rnam par bzhag pa yin te /
K10D0335_H0339:418b-0: sems can rnams bden pa gnyis po kun @418b rdzob kyi bden pa dang /
K10D0335_H0339:418b-1: don dam pa'i bden pa rjes su dran par bya
K10D0335_H0339:418b-2: ba'i ched du don 'di rnam par bzhag pa yin
K10D0335_H0339:418b-3: no // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
K10D0335_H0339:418b-4: ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung
K10D0335_H0339:418b-5: chen po 'khor stong nyis brgya dang /
K10D0335_H0339:418b-6: 'khor 'dus pa chen po rnams shin tu dga' zhing gus pas mngon par bstod do //
